channel.title: Rune Online [VPS]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1GBrmFS.png[/img]
[URL=http://runeonline.no-ip.org/play.php]Play Now[/URL] | [URL=http://runeonline.no-ip.org/download.jar]Download[/URL] | [URL=http://runeonline.no-ip.org/index.php]Website[/URL] | [URL=http://qwebirc.swiftirc.net/?nick=RuneServer...&channels=%23RuneOnline]IRC[/URL]
No registration required.
[B]100% FREE TO PLAY - NO DONATOR-ONLY ITEMS![/B]
[B]Feature list:[/B] - VPS - - Vote for rewards - - Loyalty programme - - PK Point shop - - 100% Clan Wars PK only (safe/dangerous portals) - - Spawn most items for free (dragon claws, ags, bandos, etc.) - - Set all your levels - - Squeal of Fortune for holiday/lucky items - - Ranking system w/ titles and prestige for chat icon (also required for comp. cape) - - In-game PK hiscores - - And of course absolutely no donator-only items -
I'm not even close to being done with the server so expect daily updates! I plan to add a lot more shops and more areas to PK in, such as areas with combat level restrictions and random drops. I might even throw in some PvM at some point.
[B][SIZE=4]Media[/SIZE][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4I1swhq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0cyDQmb.png[/img] [/CENTER]
